body: Attaching patch to support Return to Ravnica's Stealer of Secrets.
author: [nad...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108639406225975804166/)
title: Card: Stealer of Secrets

comments.body:
Thanks for the contribution :) Merged in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=b3b83cb60aa7bd14778687f48e9f9deb1b28162d

**Status:** Fixed  
  **Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
Hi,

I'm currently testing the support I just added for Dispel (had to create a new "instant spell" target).

Is submitting cards as tickets what you guys would like to see or is there a more efficient way to go about it?
comments.author: [nad...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108639406225975804166/)

comments.body:
Hmm, the preferred way would be to create a clone @ https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/clones then push your changes to the clone. 

When the change is ready, just request for a merge with an issue or by posting to our mailing list, magarena@googlegroups.com
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
